Text.Language: Ariv~meui~ P[oic n~nenio] nem nenc~n/ou e~tauenkot aum~ton m~mowu: qen v~nah] n~oryodoxoc: mam~ton n~nou'u,/ t/rou.
Remember, O Lord, our fathers and brethren who have fallen asleep and reposed in the orthodox faith; repose all their souls.
